data.text: The 1998 Avengers film adaptation of the tv series, no one else in the world seemed but I rather liked it. It was completely daft and i have no idea how faithful it was or wasn't to the original but I thought it was fun nonsense.
Eddie Izzard, Keeley Hawes and as a knife wielding thug Shaun Ryder from the Happy Monday's all just appeared.
Just had a scene with Sean Connery dressed as a teddy bear having a meeting where everyone else was dressed as a teddy bear.
Paused it as it's on the syfy channel and i want to be able to fast forward through the adds.
